org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan
Interface Schedule

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.Collection, java.lang.Iterable, java.util.List, TimeSpan
All Known Subinterfaces:
NewRelationshipSchedule, NewRoleSchedule, NewSchedule, RelationshipSchedule, RoleSchedule
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssignedRelationshipScheduleImpl, RelationshipScheduleImpl, RoleScheduleImpl, ScheduleImpl
public interface Schedule
extends java.util.List, TimeSpan

A Schedule is an encapsulation of spatio-temporal relationships. Current thought is to bind up both time and space into a single object which may then be queried in various ways to test for overlaps, inclusion, exclusion, etc with other schedules. Extends Collection to provide direct access to the collection api accessors, and TimeSpan to allow comparison of whole schedules to each other.

getScheduleElementsWithTime

java.util.Collection getScheduleElementsWithTime(long aTime)
Returns:
a sorted Collection of schedule elements that include this date. Note that each schedule element will have a start date less than or equal to the specified date and an end date after the specified date.

getOverlappingScheduleElements

java.util.Collection getOverlappingScheduleElements(java.util.Date startDate,
                                                    java.util.Date endDate)
Deprecated. Use getOverlappingScheduleElements(long, long)

getOverlappingScheduleElements

java.util.Collection getOverlappingScheduleElements(long startTime,
                                                    long endTime)
Returns:
a sorted Collection of schedule elements that have dates in the given range of dates. Note that these schedule elements may or may not be fully bound by the date range - they may overlap. Note that enddates are not included in time spans.

getEncapsulatedScheduleElements

Deprecated. use getEncapsulatedScheduleElements(long, long)

getEncapsulatedScheduleElements

java.util.Collection getEncapsulatedScheduleElements(long startTime,
                                                     long endTime)
Returns:
a sorted collection of schedule elements that are fully bound or encapsulated by a date range. Note that enddates are not included in time spans.
